class="int-warpper"><div class="left"><p>Are you ready to rock out?</p><p>Let's build a band in Party room!</p><p>Invite friends to join your virtual party, collaborate on music projects, and even host live performances! Don't forget to use instruments to make your music more creative! </p><p>Connect with people from all around the world who share your passion for music, interact with others, share your music creations, and make new friends all in a virtual reality environment.</p></div><div class="right"><img src="/static/media/intro_1.3119bdfa8bca050161bd.png" alt=""></div></div></div><div class="swiper-slide slide swiper-slide-next"><div class="int-warpper"><div class="left"><p>Are you ready to take your singing skills to the next level? Or prefer to sing solo? SingStar offers access to over 2 million songs in the library!</p><p>Find every kind of songs you like, ranging from classic hits to modern pop tracks, it offers something for everyone.</p><p>Whether you're a professional singer or just someone who loves to sing in the shower, SingStar in StarMaker is the perfect platform to showcase your talent.</p><p>Are you ready to take center stage?</p></div><div class="right"><img src="/static/media/intro4.a0fc4521ce2db98ff776.jpg" alt=""></div></div></div><div class="swiper-slide slide"><div class="int-warpper"><div class="left"><p>Immerse yourself in a virtual world of music, dancing and socializing.</p><p>With stunning visuals and a wide variety of environments to choose from, it is the perfect place to relax, let your hair down and enjoy your favorite tunes.</p><p>Sing your heart out to your favorite songs and compete with other singers for high scores on the leaderboard.</p><p>Whether you want to sing your heart out in a beautiful nature setting, dance the night away in a neon cityscape, or escape to a magical fantasy world, the options are limitless!</p></div><div class="right"><img src="/static/media/intro_3.a2906141b9d14014c9b7.png" alt=""></div></div></div><div class="swiper-slide slide"><div class="int-warpper"><div class="left"><p>Channel your inner samurai and become a Taiko master!</p><p>With your drumsticks in hand, you can beat out the rhythm of the music and feel like a real Taiko master.</p><p>And with its engaging gameplay and charming visuals, TaikoStar is a delight for the senses.</p><p>With a constantly expanding library of songs and drumming patterns, you'll never run out of new challenges to conquer in TaikoStar, there's something for everyone in this exciting and unique game.</p></div><div class="right"><img src="/static/media/intro5.26df004496223599d95b.png" alt=""></div></div></div><div class="swiper-slide slide"><div class="int-warpper"><div class="left"><p>Ready for a challenge?</p><p>Let's experience a unique and thrilling experience that combines the fast-paced action of a shooter game.</p><p>As you battle digital demons and protect the music world, you'll need to be quick on your feet and even quicker with your hands.</p><p>With intuitive controls and engaging gameplay, you'll be blasting away at the enemy in no
